task.title: Terminate Instance
task.shortdesc: This dialog box allows you to confirm or cancel a terminate instance operation.

step.cmd: Verify that you wish to terminate the selected instance(s). You may click the x button on the instance ID to remove the instance from the list of instances to be deleted.
To terminate the instance(s), click the Yes, Terminate button.
To cancel the terminate operation, click the x button in the upper right corner of the dialog box.
